name: qaravel
description: Qaravel is a Combination of Laravel and Quasar
author: DepokSarkar <dipak@coderstm.com>

scripts.commit: clear && git config core.ignorecase false && branch="$(git symbolic-ref -q HEAD)" || "dev" && branch=${branch##refs/heads/} && branch=${branch:-HEAD} && echo Commiting to Branch "$branch" && echo Please type your commit message && read msg && clear && git add . && git commit -m "$msg"
scripts.push:git: clear && git config core.ignorecase false && branch="$(git symbolic-ref -q HEAD)" || "dev" && branch=${branch##refs/heads/} && branch=${branch:-HEAD} && echo Pushing to Branch "$branch" && echo Please type your commit message && read msg && clear && git add . && git commit -m "$msg" && git push origin "$branch"
scripts.push:live: clear && echo Starting Live Push && yarn build:prod && yarn sync:live && echo Finished Live Push
scripts.push:alpha: clear && echo Starting Alpha Push && yarn build:alpha && yarn sync:alpha && echo Finished Alpha Push
scripts.build:prod: quasar build && yarn make:icons && yarn build
scripts.build:alpha: cross-env BUILD_MODE=alpha quasar build && yarn make:icons && yarn dev
scripts.build:dev: quasar build && yarn make:icons && yarn dev
scripts.build:android: yarn make:app-icons -m capacitor && cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-alpha quasar build --mode capacitor --target android
scripts.build:ios: yarn make:app-icons -m capacitor && cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-alpha quasar build --mode capacitor --target ios
scripts.start:android: cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-dev quasar dev -m capacitor --target android
scripts.start:ios: cross-env BUILD_MODE=app-dev quasar dev -m capacitor --target ios
scripts.sync:live: echo Starting Live File Sync && rsync -avz --delete --exclude-from=".syncignore" -e "ssh -p 22 " * $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server:$npm_package_config_ssh_folders_live && ssh $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server "cd $npm_package_config_ssh_folders_live && /usr/bin/php81 -f /usr/local/bin/composer2 install && /usr/bin/php81 artisan config:cache && /usr/bin/php81 artisan view:clear && /usr/bin/php81 artisan migrate && /usr/bin/php81 artisan storage:link --force" && echo Finished Live File Sync
scripts.sync:alpha: echo Starting Alpha File Sync && rsync -avz --delete --exclude-from=".syncignore" -e "ssh -p 22 " * $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server:$npm_package_config_ssh_folders_alpha && ssh $npm_package_config_ssh_user@$npm_package_config_ssh_server "cd $npm_package_config_ssh_folders_alpha && /usr/bin/php81 -f /usr/local/bin/composer2 install && /usr/bin/php81 artisan config:cache && /usr/bin/php81 artisan view:clear && /usr/bin/php81 artisan migrate && /usr/bin/php81 artisan storage:link --force" && echo Finished Alpha File Sync
scripts.build:clean: echo Cleaning old build && del-cli public/assets public/pdfjs public/mix-manifest.json
